details.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.2.11 Fonts - 6.2.11.2 Font types - embedded fond Subtype
details.description: All fonts used in a conforming file shall conform to the font specifications defined in PDF Reference 5.5. The subtype is the value of the Subtype key, if present, in the font file stream dictionary. The only valid values of this key in PDF 1.7 are Type1C - Type 1–equivalent font program represented in the Compact Font Format (CFF), CIDFontType0C - Type 0 CIDFont program represented in the Compact Font Format (CFF) and OpenType - OpenType® font program, as described in the OpenType Specification v.1.4.
